attributes.action: Vote of no confidence in the current cabinet & call for a snap general election.
attributes.additional_details: After years of austerity when there are now no funds for infrastructure, education, healthcare or social care this morally bankrupt government has found the funds to carry out unsanctioned regime change in a state with a democratically elected leadership. This is simply unacceptable & has to be stopped before the folly of the few leads to further,larger global conflict.
attributes.background: Mays' government is blindly following Trump without a mandate from parliament & without even a debate in the house.  This is not democracy.
